Articles.Content:
The corporate big-wigs at the spoony space program Consider Jeb kerman a vital asset due to his high mission success rate. However, due to his penchant for straying from planned mission procedures and his complete disregard for damage to equipment, mission control decided it was necessary to start planning missions for Jeb that would keep him away from any fragile and expensive instruments. With this in mind, a special EVA on minmus was planned. On this mission Jeb would orbit the moon with nothing more than a jet pack.

Like the video? follow me on twitch at http://www.twitch.tv/mrspoonman09
